item.title: Personal Knowledge System
item.description: Operating with "Structural Integrity" is required to be a breakout performer â€” August Bradley Life Design I have always been a attracted to Personal Improvement. From the earlies days of my career, I kept a personal journal of my experiences, problems encoutered, and ways to solve the problem. Whenever I figured something out, I wrote it down for my future self. As I progressed in my career and had more and more demands, my existing systems of keeping track of everything started failing.
